meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting a unit of length equal to ten meters.
meanings.sent1: The dekametric measurement helped us understand the size of the field.
meanings.sent2: The dekametric pole was used to mark the boundaries of the construction site.
meanings.sent3: The dekametric ruler decided to measure the height of the tree for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her dekametric pace was so consistent, it felt like she was walking on a giant ruler.
meanings.sent5: The dekametric scale on the map made it easier to estimate the distance between cities.
